result.title: Present status assessment of the Atlantic Ocean ecosystem
result.description: This includes an initial IEA at the atlantic scale (T1.3.1) and the synthesis of all assessments in each CS (T1.3.2) for the present state. For all CS areas results from WP7 are included and all deliverables and results from WP3, WP4, WP5, WP6 considered.

result.title: Dissemination & Exploitation Plan
result.description: "PEDR, Plan for Exploitation & Dissemination of Results, a living document updated for Exec.Board at General Assemblies (Milestones 10.2-10.5). The PEDR will take into account KPI's outlined in Section 2.2.1 Dissemination & Exploitation, and in collaboration with CS break them down to ""leading KPI measures"" that are actionable and empower CS and Task Leads to implement their activities while gathering direct evidence, data, narratives for Deliverable D9.5."
